text: @morningmika Like firefighters, a president needs to be able to rise to the occasion and act quickly when needed in order to minimize damage. His delayed and unorganized responses to both Covid19 & Floyd murder has cost 1000's of lives and caused civil unrest. A day late. A dollar short.
